attributes.action: To reconsider opening soft play centres for children
attributes.additional_details: I want the government to discuss ways for these places to open safely!
attributes.background: All soft play centres are closed yet schools nurseries, Leisure centres, cafés and pubic parks are open, with the right restriction in place these places can reopen safely just like schools and other public places

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/555523
